name: com.unity.selection-groups
description: Provides editor tools for working with arbitrary groups of gameobjects along with the hierarchy window and inspector.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
* internal-api: add SelectionGroup.FindMemberComponents() 

### Changed
* ui: move SelectionGroup color icon to the rightmost position
* opt: replace foreach to reduce GC
* deps: use com.unity.film-internal-utilities@0.19.1-preview
